title: Swiss Chard, Chickpea and Tamarind Stew

ingredients.content: 240 g tinned chickpeas (1 x 400 g tin, drained)
220 g tinned butter beans (1 x 400 g tin, drained)

preparations.content: Blanch chard in a large pot of boiling hot water for 1 minute then transfer to simmering basket. Run under cold water then leave to drain.
Place blanched chard in mixing bowl then chop <b>6 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer back to simmering basket and set aside.
Place onions, oil and caraway seeds in mixing bowl then chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sautè <b>4 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add tomato purèe and stir <b>1 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add tomatoes, tamarind, water, chickpeas, butterbeans, sugar, coriander, salt and pepper then cook <b>15 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Add reserved chopped chard and simmer <b>15 min/95°C//speed 1<b>. Transfer to bowls and sprinkle with red chilli flakes. Enjoy on its own or with rice.
